name: Bound Vanguard
shortDescription: Frontline spellblades who wield a bound entity through violent, close-range techniques.
description: A Bound Vanguard channels supernatural power through a permanent contract with a bound entity. Rather than formal spellcasting, their magic manifests as brutal, momentary techniques fueled by Manifest Energy.

features.name: Martial Foundation
features.description: You gain one Fighting Style, as the Fighter class.

features.name: Halphas, Contracted Presence
features.description: You cannot be flanked. Enemies do not gain advantage against you from positioning alone. You have advantage on Perception checks relying on sight or hearing.

features.name: Manifest Energy
features.description: You gain a pool of Manifest Energy (ME) used to fuel Manifest Techniques.

features.name: Manifest Strike
features.description: Once per turn when you hit with a weapon attack, you may spend 1 ME to enhance the strike with force or thunder power.

features.name: Guardian Intercept
features.description: When you or an ally within 5 ft is hit, you may reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Constitution modifier.

features.name: Manifest Techniques
features.description: You learn Universal Manifest Techniques and gain access to Disposition Techniques.

features.name: Manifest Strain
features.description: Using Manifest Techniques can cause strain, imposing drawbacks depending on your level.

features.name: Manifest Hesitation
features.description: In stressful situations, you may be required to make a Manifest Hesitation check when using powerful techniques.

features.name: Halphas’s Disposition
features.description: Halphas’s current Disposition determines which Disposition Manifest Techniques are available to you.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice whenever you take the Attack action.

features.name: Shared Pressure
features.description: Hostile creatures within 5 ft of you treat the area as difficult terrain.

features.name: Manifest Surge
features.description: Once per turn when you spend ME, you may gain a minor secondary benefit.

features.name: Dual Threat
features.description: You may treat a space within 10 ft as if you occupy it for certain class features.

features.name: Supernatural Resilience
features.description: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws, or Charisma if already proficient.

features.name: Manifest Mastery
features.description: Your Manifest Strike and Guardian Intercept improve.

features.name: Irrevocable Contract
features.description: You are immune to frightened, have advantage against charm, and can refuse death once per long rest.

features.name: Unbound Moment
features.description: Once per long rest, you briefly suppress strain and push beyond mortal limits.

features.name: Contract Fulfilled
features.description: You reach the apex of your bond, continuously regenerating Manifest Energy and dominating nearby foes.
